items.title: Change bun to npm as builder
items.description: Replace bun with npm for build scripts

items.title: Fix broken components
items.description: Identify and fix web components that are not working correctly

items.title: Decide what components are needed
items.description: Review component list and determine which ones are actually needed

items.title: Check nuke-docs project for references
items.description: Look at nuke-docs project to see what components are used and how they work in a real project

items.title: Import Phosphor Icons
items.description: Add Phosphor Icons as the standard icon library for the design system

items.title: Rethink style-1/style-2 approach - could be a token like --filled: true/false
Identify elements that need ghost variant (style-3)
items.description: Audit components to decide which ones need a third ghost/borderless style variant (e.g., button, icon-button). Document the pattern.

items.title: Discuss alternative: ship separate components (button-1, button-2, button-3)
items.description: Evaluate whether to use nuke-style attribute vs shipping distinct components per variant. Pros/cons of each approach.

items.title: Audit: which components need style variants
items.description: Go through each component and decide: needs style-1/2/3, or just one default style. Document the pattern.

items.title: Define composite component architecture
items.description: Decide folder structure for related components (nav-rail + nav-rail-item, etc). Flat vs grouped.

items.title: Layout components audit
items.description: Identify layout components needed to build nuke-docs-style apps. Grid, sidebar, rail, header, main content area, etc.

items.title: Nav rail component
items.description: Vertical nav rail with icon + optional label. Collapsed/expanded states. Includes nav-rail-item.

items.title: Header dropdown nav
items.description: Horizontal header navigation with dropdown menus.

items.title: Mobile nav
items.description: Mobile navigation pattern - hamburger menu, slide-out drawer or similar.

items.title: HMR setup: lib to frontend
items.description: Watch lib changes and auto-rebuild so Vite picks up updates in frontend dev.

items.title: Frontend as capability showcase
items.description: Make frontend prove the lib is complete - should rebuild nuke-docs-style app without custom component styles.

items.title: Switch to Radix Icons
items.description: Replace Phosphor Icons with Radix Icons. Simple, flat, made for UI.

items.title: Add design token for centered layouts (app-shell-stacked)
items.description: Create token for max-width centering in stacked layouts. Currently uses --content-width hardcoded.

items.title: Evaluate background tokens through layers
items.description: Review --background-1/2/3/4 tokens. Rename to --background-body (shows through gaps), --background-shell, --background-primitive, --background-component, --background-hover. Body background creates visual hairline in block mode.

items.title: Audit 1/2/3 token naming vs shell/primitive/component
items.description: Some tokens use 1/2/3 for scale (space, width, z-index), others for tree level (gap, radius). Evaluate where shell/primitive/component naming is more meaningful than numeric suffixes.

items.title: Discuss padding token system
items.description: Currently --space-1/2/3 used for padding. Could add --padding-shell, --padding-primitive, --padding-component for per-layer control. Discuss: should --unit and --ratio only apply to component sizing? How does padding relate to gap system?

items.title: Discuss: Replace style attributes with layer tokens
items.description: Explore replacing nuke-style='1/2/3' with more cascading tokens. Example: --border token (1px solid var(--border-color) or none) could control component styles through the tree. Buttons/inputs could be: minimal (underline), bordered (no bg), filled (bg only), filled+bordered. Design tokens become the style system instead of attributes.

items.title: Audit unit and ratio token usage
items.description: Review where --unit and --ratio are used across the system. --ratio should only be used for forms (padding calculation from height). Check if --text-base should depend on --ratio or be pure unit-based. Ensure layout tokens only use --unit, not --ratio.
